config.response_template: {     {% if body.ListedMerchants and #body.ListedMerchants > 0 then %}         "bankAccounts":[            {% for i, bank_account in ipairs(body.ListedMerchants[1].BankAccountList) do %}                {                    "id": {{bank_account.Id}},                    "accountNumber": "{{bank_account.AccountNumber}}",                    "accountNumberVerificationCode": "{{bank_account.AccountNumberVerificationCode}}",                    "agencyNumber": "{{bank_account.AgencyNumber}}",                    "agencyNumberVerificationCode": "{{bank_account.AgencyNumberVerificationCode}}",                    {% if bank_account.Bank then %}                    "bankId": {{bank_account.Bank.Id}},                    "bankName": "{{bank_account.Bank.Name}}",                    {% else %}                    "bankId": null                    "bankName": null                    {% end %}                    "statusId": {{bank_account.BankAccountStatusId}},                    {% if bank_account.BankAccountType then %}                    "typeId": {{bank_account.BankAccountType.Id}},                    "typeName": "{{bank_account.BankAccountType.Name}}",                    {% else %}                    "typeId": null,                    "typeName": null,                    {% end %}                    "centralizedPayment": {{bank_account.CentralizedPayment}}                {% if i == #body.ListedMerchants[1].BankAccountList then %}                }                {% else %}                },                {% end %}            {% end %}        ],    {% end %}    "messages": {% if body.Message then %} ["{{body.Message}}"] {% else %} [] {% end %} }
